MicroKit is a comprehensive SaaS platform designed to help developers organize, manage, and utilize their code snippets and scripts efficiently. 

For more about MicroKit App see: https://www.microkit.net

MicroKit Chrome Plugin

The MicroKit Chrome Plugin enables developers to save code snippets and notes directly from their browser. With this plugin, you can effortlessly capture and store any selected text or code snippet from web pages and save it to your MicroKit account for later use.

Features and Benefits:

Quick Capture and Easy Access: Highlight any text or code snippet on a webpage and save it instantly with a single click. Keep all your notes and snippets in one place, accessible from anywhere.
Seamless Integration and Organized Storage: Directly integrates with your MicroKit account, ensuring your snippets are always accessible. Save and categorize your notes and snippets for easy retrieval and organization.
Context Menu Integration: Right-click on any selected text to open a new window directly on the add note page in the MicroKit app, streamlining the saving process.
Improved Productivity and Enhanced Workflow: Eliminate the need to switch between browser and notes application, enhancing your workflow efficiency. Save time by directly capturing and storing important information without leaving your browser.
